text_block_list.text: For the New Year's first race, Special Week was entering the GII [America JCC].

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Here she comes! As expected, here comes the Derby Uma Musume, Special Week!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: 2 lengths, pulling away to 3 lengths, she crosses the goal! The Derby Uma Musume, Special Week, with a magnificent victory!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hell yeah! You did it, Spe!! Thanks for the excitement!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: This is the best first step towards the [Spring Tenno Sho] you can make!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Spe-chan, congratulations on your victory♪

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! Once again, just watching that race got my blood pumping!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, Thanks Grass-chan and Tsuru-chan!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Out of all of us, you were the first one to get their first Senior class win!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Really though, Tsuru-chan should have been the one to run before me.

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Gununu… That's right, but―

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Last year, because I wasn't feeling well, I only got to run in 3 races, but this year it'll be different for me!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: After the New Year, I'll be the first one that gets to run their heart out, this year for sure I'll get to run with Spe-chan and everyone else!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah! We'll definitely run together!

text_block_list.name: Teacher
text_block_list.text: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi-san has injured her leg. For the time being, she'll be taking a break.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Ueeeeeeeh～?!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: After my debut race my physical condition got worse, and I was able to recover by the fall, but I kinda guessed this would happen though～…

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: But, but, but! Once this leg heals, I'll catch up to you in no time, so just you wait!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Tsuru-chan hasn't been able to participate in many races due to injuries but, her runs are quite amazing. I definitely would like to try running together.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, someday with me, Grass-chan, and El-chan too, all together!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh? In that case, should we all go to France together?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: France…?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Starting in Spring, El will be in France for an extended campaign. With her results from the [Japan Cup], next she wants to go overseas.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Eeeeh?! I didn't know that! El-chan, you're going to France?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Bueno! I'll show you I can even shock the whole world!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Is that so… rather than amazing, I can't even imagine that…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …But, I think it'll be a little lonely. El-chan, going there by yourself, won't you be lonely?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Of course, If I said I wasn't lonely it'd be a lie, a fiction, and a fairy tale…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: … How-ev-er! More than that, my dream is what will pull me forward!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Your dream…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: To prove that El is the "World's Strongest"! The moment I become the strongest, make sure you don't miss it!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: Going out in to the world to chase your dream! That's awesome, El-chan!

text_block_list.name: Tsurumaru Tsuyoshi
text_block_list.text: That really makes me want to work even harder! I want to run as soon as possible～!!!! Cough, cough!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Please calm down, Tsuru-chan. Pushing yourself is prohibited, okay?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: However, I really understand that feeling. We can't lose to El either, right?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: M-me too! I'll win the next race and then the [Spring Tenno Sho] after that!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: To get closer to "Japan's #1 Uma Musume"!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Suzuka-san, thanks for the massage! Thanks to that, my legs are all squishy now!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Today's training, it seemed like you were working harder than usual.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: It's because I heard that El-chan would be challenging herself overseas!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: In an unfamiliar place running alone, it'll definitely be hard, but El-chan is challenging herself for the sake of her dream.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Her feelings towards her dream are what pull her forward― That's why, I felt like I needed to work harder too!

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Your feelings towards your dream pulling you forward… without a doubt that's the way it is.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: …Hey, Spe-chan.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Yeah, what do you need?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I was thinking that I wanted to challenge some overseas races too.

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …eh?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ever since joining , I've been able to see so many types of "scenery".

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: While I'm running, a new "scenery" expands before me, and the feeling of wanting to keep running overflows…

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Faster, further ahead― I want to keep chasing that "scenery".

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: I can't seem to keep holding back these feelings, that's why…

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: Overseas… Suzuka-san is, going overseas…?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: …eh?

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: EEEEEEEHHHH～?!
